Pre-Game Insights: Virat Kohli's form has been a big talking point in the buildup for India. After a spectacular season in the Indian Premier League, Kohli has struggled in the World Cup so far, scoring only five runs in three matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India has already secured a spot in the Super 8 stage of the tournament with three straight wins.
Others: The match between India and Canada is set to take place on June 15 at Central Broward Park in Lauderhill, Florida, with the start time being 10:30 a.m. local time (ET).
